title: Print, "Flower of Hollyhock (Hana-Aoi), No. 14", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Flower of Hollyhock
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 14 / Hana-Aoi.
description: A large iris, outer perianth leaves light purple, inner leaves deep purple.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Flower of Hollyhock (Hana-Aoi), No. 14", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.9 x 28 cm (16 1/8 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-68.
